Text.Page:
Hey, you! You were in the Vault of Oriyn!
Can I ask a little favor of you if you're already heading to Havenstone?

Our job is to guard the Southern Gate and Havenstone, and to eliminate any invading demokron shock troopers.
As I'm sure you know, we lost Verikam and Oriyn's Arcana at the same time. Since everyone is searching for Verikam and Oriyn's Arcana, forces are stretched thin.
Currently, we're not in a position to face the demokron shock troopers. To ensure the safety of Highwatch, we've been ordered to hold the fort here.

We're not able to completely wipe out a single demokron shock trooper anyway.
The problem is that the demokron shock troopers pose a danger to ordinary citizens.
It has come to my ear that you are extremely competent. You wouldn't be able to deal with this threat, would you?
If you were to eliminate a few demokrons on your way to the Qeldar Station, we'll gladly reward you. "Leave it to me."

After the Vault of Oriyn incident, all the military forces of Highwatch gathered to find Verikam and protect the city.
However, the demokron forces that invaded Havenstone were too powerful, so you rushed to the guards' aid.

Ah! Yes, you are , the visitor from the south.

Thank you for helping us."I hope what I am doing is helping."
